summary: This is an email chain from August 26-27, 2019, among FBI and NYPD task force members coordinating logistics for escorting victims to the courthouse for a Jeffrey Epstein hearing. It discusses meeting points, timing, attire, and handling press to protect victims.

events.title: Epstein Hearing
events.description: A court hearing for Jeffrey Epstein's case where victims were to be escorted to the courthouse with reserved seating, requiring coordination from law enforcement to avoid press.

locations: 290 (likely referring to 290 Broadway, FBI New York Field Office)
Courthouse (unspecified location, presumably in New York)
keyFacts: Law enforcement (FBI/NYPD Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force) coordinated to escort victims to an Epstein hearing on August 28, 2019.
Victims were to meet at SDNY before the hearing and be escorted to the courthouse to avoid press contact.
Personnel were instructed to wear suits for the hearing, as directed by higher-ups.
The email chain shows logistical planning for victim support and courtroom management in a high-profile case.
